name: PKPaymentRequestPaymentMethodUpdate
desc: An object that updates the payment request after the payment method changes.

items.name: init(errors: [Error]?, paymentSummaryItems: [PKPaymentSummaryItem])
items.desc: Creates a payment-method update with your specified payment summary items.

items.name: var errors: [Error]!
items.desc: An array of payment-method errors that the user must resolve.
